nodes.bodyText: you can do line breaks in this file and they will appear as spaces. It also looks like you have a tab on the following line that is breaking the indentation of the file, the tab should be replaced with spaces.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -2213,3 +2213,11 @@

Warcraft: Lordaeron Wars is a strategy game based on the (World of) Warcraft setting by Blizzard Entertainment. Set in the Eastern Kingdoms of Azeroth, you will control one of the numerous races and factions vrying for supremacy of the continent.

+- mapName: G40_Alt_Universe + mapCategory: EXPERIMENTAL + url: https://github.com/triplea-maps/g40_alt_universe/archive/master.zip + version: 1 + img: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/triplea-maps/g40_alt_universe/master/map/snapshot%20%26%20description/G40_Alt_Universe_Map_Snapshot_Small.png + description: | +

G40 Alt Universe is for those who love Axis and Allies 1940 Global, but are looking for a new strategic experience.  The war is the same, but occurs in an alternate universe where the Earth’s land formation happened differently.  It’s a return to the early days of pouring over the map and developing strategies in an unfamiliar setting.
